Mixing ratio

Source: R/utilities.R
mixing_ratio_from_dewpoint.Rd

Estimation of mixing ratio from pressure [hPa] and dewpoint temperature [K].

Usage

mixing_ratio_from_dewpoint(dewpoint, pressure)

Arguments

dewpoint

temperature [K]

pressure

in [hPa]

Author

Ahmed Homoudi
